@mike953100, I agree about the audio of YIFY's torrents. As you stated, "the audio is an abomination." Especially considering how great the video is of YIFY's rips. I love YIFY's compact files. They are amazing, but the audio awful!

Do you know of any other TPB user similar to YIFY that rips with good audio? I really love YIFY because of the file size, but would also love to find someone who rips with good audio (ie: 6 channels)

I looked you up and see that you also rip with similar amazingly small size AND you have great audio! But, you obviously don't have as much time as YIFY to put out the quantity of titles.

Is there anyone like YIFY on TPB that rips with good audio?

THANKS @mike953100!

AND THANKS YIFY for all your hard work!!!!! I just wish you would rip with better audio.

YIFY sometimes mislabels his rips w/o the LQ or line audio warning. Now, I never know which of his releases are true retail BluRay quality... and which are not.

Can't guarantee the quality on ALL of his rips, but this is another good source for mHD with DD5.1 audio.
http://thepiratebay.se/user/Brownsugar13/

And Ganool seems to have many HQ m720p (stereo) rips.
http://thepiratebay.se/search/Ganool/0/3/200

Any other trusted mHD rippers at TPB ?

I love when people say stuff can't be a BluRay or DVD rip because it's not even out yet. Seems to me I had the DVD version of the Avengers a little over a full month before it was out on DVD here.
